issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description: I am working behind a proxy and using both windows and mac machine behind the same proxy. I am able to launch the studio successfully on the windows but not able to launch it on mac machine by filling the same proxy details. I am using MAC OS 7.0.X and titanium's 2.0.2,even i have tried on 6.0.8 .Have filled in the network settings also for the proxy user credentials.But still i am not able to launch the studio on the MAC.Please help.?TIA
fields.summary: Need help to launch Titanium Studio on Mac behind a Proxy

comments.body:
Hello,

I am unable to reproduce the issue: I tried to set a proxy setting, and Studio starts just fine. I am using v2.1.0.201206251749.

Also, note that Studio also starts without an internet connection.

Let me know if you have any other detail.
Closing at no response from the reporter.
